summary: Ash, Pikachu, and friends must stop Mewtwo and a group of Genesect from the destroying the city.
cast: Sarah Natochenny|Eileen Stevens|Jason Griffith|Kayzie Rogers|Michele Knotz|James Carter Cathcart|Jake Paque|Miriam Pultro|Scott Rayow|Samia Mounts|Yûko Minaguchi|Tom Wayland|Marc Thompson|Dick Eriksson|Kiyotaka Furushima|Megumi Hayashibara|Inuko Inuyama|Unshô Ishizuka|Eli James|Rica Matsumoto|Shin'ichirô Miki|Mamoru Miyano|Tsuguo Mogami|Sumire Morohoshi|Andreas Nilsson|Lisa Ortiz|Bill Rogers|Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld|Yûko Sanpei|Kensuke Satô|Erica Schroeder|Reiko Takashima|Kenta Tokui|Minami Tsuda|Akeno Watanabe|Kôichi Yamadera|Takashi Yoshimura|Aoi Yûki|Ikue Ôtani
title: La Película Pokémon: Genesect y el despertar de una leyenda
